column6: Your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man joins forces with the X-Men's resident weather-controller, Storm! The duo match wits against a power-stealing super-villain in this thrilling all-new tale! That's right, True Believer--this is a never-before-told story of wall-to-wall-crawling and wind-riding in the magnificent Marvel Age manner!
column8: | colorist:HiFi Colour | inker:Pat Davidson | writer:Todd Dezago | penciller (cover):Randall Green | penciller:Valentine De Landro | letterer:Dave Sharpe
